definition:
A polynomial $f \in R[x_1, \dots, x_n]$ in $n$ variables with
coefficients in a ring $R$ is [*symmetric*]{} if $\sigma(f) = f$ for
every permutation $\sigma$ of the set $\{x_1, \dots, x_n\}$.

Every symmetric polynomial can be written as a polynomial expression in
the elementary symmetric polynomials.
